meanings.definition: The quality or state of doing good or causing good to be done; kindness; charity.
meanings.sent1: Her beneficence towards the homeless shelter was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The community was touched by his beneficence in helping those in need.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed beneficence by sharing its toy with the dog.
meanings.sent4: The sun's beneficence warmed the earth after a cold winter.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's beneficence towards her students knew no bounds.

meanings.definition: An act of kindness or charity.
meanings.sent1: The donation to the food bank was a true beneficence.
meanings.sent2: She performed an act of beneficence by helping the elderly lady cross the street.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's beneficence in sharing its nuts with the birds was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The beneficence of the volunteers brought hope to the disaster-stricken town.
meanings.sent5: His small act of beneficence had a big impact on the community.
